entry.title: Request for Proudly Serving feedback: Buy better

link.title: Request for Proudly Serving feedback: Buy better

entry.content:
A new Proudly Serving chapter titled Buy better is ready for public review and feedback. This chapter was written by Rebecca Woodbury and Catherine Geanuracos.

We welcome your suggestions and ideas.

Share

Share this chapter with other subject matter experts in your network. The more feedback, the better the chapter will be.

Feedback

Feedback is due November 10.

Once we’ve incorporated the feedback, the chapter will be added to the Proudly Serving manuscript.
entry.summary: A new Proudly Serving chapter titled 'Buy better' by Rebecca Woodbury and Catherine Geanuracos is ready for public review and feedback.
